-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Sitemap parser
--   
--   Sitemap parser. See the <a>Web.Sitemap</a> module for an example.
@package sitemap
@version 0.1.2


-- | Parse sitemaps and extract information with lenses.
module Web.Sitemap

-- | Turn a sitemap into a list of <a>Entry</a>s.
parseSitemap :: Text -> [Entry]
data Entry
Entry :: !URL -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Double -> Entry
_loc :: Entry -> !URL
_lastmod :: Entry -> Maybe Text
_changefreq :: Entry -> Maybe Text
_priority :: Entry -> Maybe Double
loc :: Lens' Entry URL
lastmod :: Lens' Entry (Maybe Text)
changefreq :: Lens' Entry (Maybe Text)
priority :: Lens' Entry (Maybe Double)
type URL = Text
